name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Ronald Lee DOUGALEWICZ, Jr., Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Ronald Lee DOUGALEWICZ, Jr., Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 28th day of March, 2017, this appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Justices Donohue and Wecht dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

attorneys: Hugh J. Burns Jr., Esq., for Amicus Curiae.
David Joseph DeFazio, Esq., for Appellant.
Jonathan Robert Miller, Esq., for Appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
157 A.3d 883
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Ronald Lee DOUGALEWICZ, Jr., Appellant
Nos. 22 & 23 WAP 2015
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 28, 2017
Hugh J. Burns Jr., Esq., for Amicus Curiae.
David Joseph DeFazio, Esq., for Appellant.
Jonathan Robert Miller, Esq., for Appellee.
